channel.name: BBC One NL

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: It's the call of home that's luring today's couple to head to the beautiful landscape of South Yorkshire, and Alistair Appleton is supporting them on their house hunting journey. With a ?450k budget, they want a home with enough room to welcome family and future grandchildren. Aside from property, Alistair meets a national sled dog champion and takes the reins on a high-octane race through the Yorkshire woodland.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Bidding Room
channel.desc: Nigel is faced with some Havers family history, Philip bets on getting a bite on his metal teeth, and local sellers Ben and Jenna hope to raise funds by selling off an old set of cinema seats.

channel.title: Confessions of a Steroid Gang
channel.desc: As the steroid lab thrives, father and son grow close, but greed creeps in. Macaulay finds out he's being short-changed just as police close in. Trouble is coming.

channel.desc: Lauren Laverne and Clara Amfo bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Our Lives
channel.desc: Four friends, 32 days and one small boat - an epic quest to row around Ireland and into the record books. Witness their endurance and camaraderie and the beauty of Ireland's coastline.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Would I Lie to You?
channel.desc: Rob Brydon and team captains Lee Mack and David Mitchell are joined by guests John Cooper Clarke, Judi Love, Chris McCausland and Caroline Quentin.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: The inimitable Grace Dent makes a gracious return to set the brief. Inspired by memories of picnics in the Lake District with her mum, she wants the quarter-finalists to create the perfect picnic, which must include two savoury items and one sweet.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Here We Go
channel.desc: Amy and her girlfriend Maya have been going through a bit of a rough patch, which is sad for them but great news for Rachel, who is keen to get some practice as a couples' therapist. Meanwhile, Sue has been drawn by the seductive call of bingo. She's entered a world of gambling and vice, and before long, she's playing a high stakes game of Uno, which she must win at any cost.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
channel.desc: Winnie's ready to hit the road, but first, she needs to pass her driving test. Naturally, Agnes and the gang volunteer to help her practise, and chaos soon follows. With Winnie behind the wheel, and Buster instructing, Finglas becomes a danger zone.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tenet
channel.desc: A secret agent is given a single word as his weapon and sent to prevent the onset of World War III. He must travel through time and bend the laws of nature in order to be successful in his mission.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
channel.desc: Detailed weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Joins BBC News
channel.desc: BBC One joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tech Now
channel.desc: A round-up of some of the most innovative tech engineering featured on Tech Now. Paul Carter explores how one of the world's fastest supercomputers was built - and how it is shaping climate research.

channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Influential with Katty Kay
channel.desc: Wynton Marsalis tells Katty Kay about his journey from being a young, aspiring musician in New Orleans to one of the most celebrated figures in both jazz and classical music. Marsalis reflects on his early fame and the challenges that came with it.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Ukrainecast
channel.desc: Featuring updates, interviews and analyses focused on Ukraine's situation amid the Russian invasion. As days progress, questions arise about peace prospects, Putin's aggressive approach and Trump's controversial claims.

channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Media Show
channel.desc: Experts try to piece together a succinct picture of the biggest stories making the rounds on social media platforms and news reports across the world.

channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Travel Show
channel.desc: Qasa Alom continues his journey on the Maya Train, the brand-new line that connects the towns, villages and historic sites of Mexico's Yucatan peninsula.

channel.desc: The BBC's Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Christina Trevanion is in Leominster, Herefordshire, where the teams hunt for treasures with the help of experts Tim Weeks and Kate Bliss. Who will make the most profit at auction? Christina learns all about barometers from father and son Colin and Kirby Jones.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Money for Nothing
channel.desc: In Somerset, Sarah Moore explores Keynsham recycling centre and rescues a well-worn leather recliner, a vintage formica table and a pile of woolly blankets.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: War Horse
channel.desc: It is 1914, and a struggling Devon farmer buys a remarkable but unsuitable horse at auction. When war breaks out the horse is requisitioned by the army to serve at the front.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Final Score
channel.desc: Jason Mohammad and guests bring you all the goals, latest news, analysis, reaction and interviews from the afternoon's biggest football matches.

channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Hit List
channel.desc: Tom and Faith from Warrington, best friends Johnny and Scotty from Peterborough, and best friends Nicki and Gillian from Glasgow, hope to show off their musical knowledge and win up to ?10,000. Get ready to play along.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Michael McIntyre's Big Show
channel.desc: TV and radio's Rylan Clark bravely hands over his phone in Send to All, Joel Corry and Tom Grennan perform their smash hit `Lionheart (Fearless)', an unsuspecting `Antiques Roadshow' fan gets the biggest surprise of their life, and there's an incredibly heartwarming performance from the Unexpected Star of the Show.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless Celebrities
channel.desc: A special edition of the general knowledge quiz in which four teams of celebrities try to come up with the answers that no-one else could think of. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and co-host Richard Osman, and featuring Jess Robinson, Danny Beard, Esther Manito, Rich Hall, Jane Hill, Ben Boulos, Wynne Evans, Joanna Page.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Casualty
channel.desc: Jacob is furious that he is Iain's number one suspect for the missing morphine, Cam's career is threatened after an accusation is made, and Ngozi worries that she might lose Nicole forever.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Annika
channel.desc: The team investigate a Scottish millionaire found dead in his own shark tank, leading Annika to reflect on Jekyll and Hyde.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.title: BBC Weather

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: Highlights from the first weekend of the 2025/26 Premier League season. There are six matches to enjoy, including two games involving newly promoted Sunderland and Burnley.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Queen & Slim
channel.desc: Slim and Queen's first date takes an unexpected turn when a policeman pulls them over for a minor traffic violation. When the situation escalates, Slim takes the officer's gun and shoots him in self-defence. Now labelled cop killers in the media, Slim and Queen feel that they have no choice but to go on the run and evade the law. When a video of the incident goes viral, the unwitting outlaws soon become a symbol of trauma, terror, grief and pain for people all across the country.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Eye Investigations
channel.desc: Africa Eye investigates how children are being sold for sex. In the transit town of Maai Mahiu, in Kenya's Great Rift Valley, undercover reporters expose two women exploiting children - one claiming to have a girl as young as 13 years old.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: Highlights from the first weekend of the 2025/26 Premier League season. There are six matches to enjoy, including two games involving newly promoted Sunderland and Burnley.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Scotland's Sacred Islands With Ben Fogle
channel.desc: Ben takes a tiny passenger ferry from mainland Argyll down the length of Loch Sween to arrive on Islay. While the island is famed for its whisky, the island has more distilleries than churches, its links to Christianity are ancient.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Jacqui gets a sinking feeling as she tours a Norwich house suffering from subsidence, while Martin is really surprised by developers' plans to rip everything out of a six-bedroom house in Cardiff. There are plans for a four-bedroom terrace in Dover.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Danny Sebastian hosts from Harrogate in North Yorkshire, where he learns about a scheme to recycle items from landfill. Two red and blue teams battle it out, with help from experts Izzie Balmer and John Cameron, before heading to the auction.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
channel.desc: Detailed weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Songs of Praise
channel.desc: The Rev Kate Bottley celebrates 2025's summer of women's sport and explores the role faith can play on the pitch, from grassroots to grand finals. Kate joins the UK's first female football team that also acts as a church ministry.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jules Hudson takes in Scotland's stunning Cairngorms as he helps a couple from the Isle of Wight find a rural property that will fulfil their ambitions for both a new home and a new business. Jules also drops in on a family who moved to the region to start a fly-fishing school and becomes their star pupil for the day.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to the Mexican island of Cabo Pulmo, where the people work tirelessly to bring their surrounding oceans back to life and make it a marine reserve.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Parenthood
channel.desc: Parenting in the ocean demands dedication and intelligence. From navigating the reef, to teaching young to hunt giants, these parents have remarkable strategies.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Ghostbusters
channel.desc: Supernatural comedy about three New York parapsychology professors who decide to set up a ghost-catching agency. Soon a storm of malevolent spirits threatens to destroy the city, and the mysterious contents of a woman's fridge suggest a paranormal Armageddon.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Countryfile
channel.desc: Knaresborough is a place steeped in history. But it is the River Nidd's story that flows through it all. John Craven explores the history shaped by the river before meeting those who care for it today.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Parenthood
channel.desc: Parents must constantly balance risk and reward when raising young in open grasslands. Whilst abundant grass promises plentiful food and places to call home, this alone cannot guarantee success.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Antiques Roadshow
channel.desc: The team return to Portchester Castle in Hampshire on the south coast of England. Mark Smith is stunned to see a Victoria Cross medal, the highest award for bravery in combat, and hears a story of incredible heroism during the First World War - with the staggering valuation of the humble bronze medal leaving its owners lost for words.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Narrow Road to the Deep North
channel.desc: Dorrigo returns from war and tries to get on with his life without Amy and many of his friends he lost to the POW camp.

channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: The world's most famous football show, with the big names and the big games from the Premier League.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The X-bus now makes its way to one of Europe's biggest wine making regions and the halfway point on this extraordinary journey, and host Rob Brydon still has plenty of tricks up his sleeve.
